name: CreateWorkerTimeBlock
description:
Creates a worker time block in Workday.

Use this tool to create a time block for a specified worker in the Workday system. This is useful for recording working hours, whether hourly or in certain time zones, for project-related tasks. Ensure to include necessary details like calendar date, in/out times, and select one from time entry code, project, or project plan task.

parameters.name: workday_resource_id
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the specific worker resource to create a time block for.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: worker_time_block_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details for creating a time block, including calendarDate, reportedQuantity, inTime, outTime, inTimeZone, outTimeZone, and one of timeEntryCode, project, or projectPlanTask.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
